bank.title: MAT 106 - Number Systems and Operations - CheckIt Bank

outcome.title: Analyzing Student Work
outcome.description: I can identify hypothetical student work as correct or incorrect, analyze the reasoning for incorrect mistakes, and make appropriate suggestions for improvement.

outcome.title: Word Problems (Basic Arithmetic)
outcome.description: I can solve word problems using basic arithmetic operations.

outcome.title: Ancient and Modern Numeration
outcome.description: I can convert the ancient Roman/Babylonian/Egyptian numeration systems to modern Hindu-Arabic base ten, and vice versa.

outcome.title: Compare and Contrast Ancient and Modern Numeration
outcome.description: I can compare and contrast the ancient and modern numeration systems, and explain how they represent values.

outcome.title: Base-b Addition Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute addition of multi-digit base-b whole numbers using non-standard addition algorithms.

outcome.title: Base-b Subtraction Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute subtraction of multi-digit base-b whole numbers using non-standard subtraction algorithms.

outcome.title: Properties of Addition and Multiplication
outcome.description: I can identify uses of the associative, commutative, identity, zero product, and distributive properties of addition and multiplication.

outcome.title: Explaining Properties of Addition and Multiplication
outcome.description: I can explain why the properties of addition and multiplication work, in terms that elementary students would understand.

outcome.title: Generating Appropriate Word Problems
outcome.description: I can generate elementary word problems most suitable for each of the problem structures of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

outcome.title: Base-b Multiplication Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute multiplication of multi-digit base-b whole numbers using non-standard multiplication algorithms.

outcome.title: Long Division Algorithms
outcome.description: I can compute the quotient of two whole or decimal numbers using standard and non-standard algorithms.

outcome.title: Divisibility Statements
outcome.description: I can identify divisibility statements as true or false.

outcome.title: Explaining Divisibility Statements
outcome.description: I can explain why divisibility statements are logically correct or incorrect, using general logic that elementary students would understand.

outcome.title: Prime and Composite Numbers
outcome.description: I can determine if a number is prime or composite via the prime testing method.

outcome.title: Greatest Common Divisor
outcome.description: I can compute the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two numbers using appropriate methods.

outcome.title: Least Common Multiple
outcome.description: I can compute the least common multiple (LCM) of two numbers using appropriate methods.

outcome.title: Fraction Equivalence
outcome.description: I can convert fractions to different forms (including simplest form), and determine if two fractions are equivalent.

outcome.title: Fraction Models
outcome.description: I can construct both number line and area models for fractions.

outcome.title: Explaining Fraction Models
outcome.description: I can explain how to construct fraction models, and how students can understand how they represent the numerator and denominator of a fraction.

outcome.title: Exemplifying the Denseness Property
outcome.description: I can, given two rational numbers, find any number of rational numbers between them and, in the case of decimals, place these numbers accurately on a number line.

outcome.title: Mixed Number Operations
outcome.description: I can compute the sum, difference, product, and quotient of mixed numbers.

outcome.title: Proportional Reasoning
outcome.description: I can solve word problems using proportional reasoning.

outcome.title: Decimal Place Values
outcome.description: I can identify place values in decimal numbers using both numerical notation and English words, and represent decimal numbers using base-ten blocks.

outcome.title: Explaining Decimal Place Values with Blocks
outcome.description: I can explain the relationship between place values in the base ten decimal system, and how the base ten blocks help demonstrate that relationship.

outcome.title: Decimal Conversions
outcome.description: I can convert numbers between fractions, decimals, and percents.

outcome.title: Ordering Rational Numbers
outcome.description: I can order any rational numbers, including decimals, from least to greatest.

outcome.title: Percent Word Problems
outcome.description: I can solve word problems using percents.

associate.description: I can explain the denseness property of the rational numbers, by using language appropriate for an elementary student, and by using concrete examples.
I can explain my reasoning for each step of work in solving a proportional reasoning word problem, in language that supports elementary students' understanding of how to solve such problems.
